function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Global shortages of healthcare equipment such as PPE and ventilators","Impact":"Increased risk of healthcare system collapse and inability to provide adequate care","Mitigation":"Investment in local production and stockpiling of essential medical equipment, diversification of suppliers, and development of rapid response protocols","Technologies":"Supply chain management systems, local manufacturing technologies, and predictive analytics","People":"Healthcare workers, patients, and public health institutions","Owner":"Government, healthcare institutions, and manufacturers"},{"Description":"Shocks to other industries including CE-sensitive materials extraction and mining","Impact":"Disruption to essential material supply chains and increased costs of production","Mitigation":"Diversification of material sources, investment in sustainable extraction and mining practices, and development of alternative materials","Technologies":"Supply chain tracking technologies, sustainable extraction technologies, and material substitution technologies","People":"Industry workers, manufacturers, and consumers","Owner":"Industry associations, regulatory bodies, and material suppliers"},{"Description":"Panic buying and fragility of the existing supply chain model","Impact":"Hoarding of essential supplies, increased prices, and supply chain breakdown","Mitigation":"Education on responsible purchasing, regulation of prices, and development of resilient supply chain models","Technologies":"Supply chain visibility technologies, demand forecasting systems, and consumer behavior analytics","People":"Consumers, retailers, and supply chain managers","Owner":"Retailers, consumer protection agencies, and supply chain management companies"}]}
